entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something. It's this VeloBand Pulse I bought. The thing is garbage.
I understand. I apologize for the wait time. To begin the return process for your VeloBand Pulse, can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you, one moment. Okay, I see your order here for the VeloBand Pulse, placed on July 10th. What seems to be the issue with the smart watch?
It doesn't track my heart rate accurately, the battery life is awful, and it keeps disconnecting from my phone. Honestly, it's just a waste of money. I want to return it.
I understand your frustration. I'm happy to process a return for you. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase. Since you are well within that window, it shouldn't be an issue.
Ninety days? Really? Because the website made it seem like it was only like... 10 days or something ridiculous. I was worried I was past the limit.

There may have been a misunderstanding, I assure you that you are within our VeloFit policy guidelines. You have 90 days to return your VeloBand Pulse with no questions asked. I will go ahead and issue a full refund. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label to your email address within the next 24 hours. Just pack up the smart watch in its original packaging, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location.
So, I just pack it up and send it back? That's it?
Yes, that's correct. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, a full refund will be credited back to your original payment method. This typically takes 7-10 business days.
Wow. Okay. That's... surprisingly easy. Are you sure I don't need to talk to a manager or something? I expected a huge hassle.

No, not at all. As I said, it falls within our return policy. The manager doesn’t need to be involved, I can handle this for you. We aim for a smooth experience. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks so much! You've been a huge help. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a great day!
